DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to assess the pain on contact in provoked vestibulodynia, measured with Visual Analogic Scale at week 0/week 2/week 6/week 12 after applying a patch of capsaicin.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of the Effects of Topical Capsaicin in the Treatment of Provoked Vestibulodynia
